description:
A foreign player seeks motivation, a mascot helps the other staff, and Ruriko and Murata encourage each other.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Goddess of Baseball? / The Invincible Mascot / Rah! Rah! Rah!
Yakyuu no Megami? / Muteki no Mascot / Ey Ey Oh
野球の女神? / 無敵のマスコット / えいえいおー♡
